input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Octonauts Peso and The Tree Lobster

Item keywords:
Help peso rescue the baby tree lobster!
Creature fits in peso's rescue fish-pack!
Air tank and fish-pack can snap onto peso's back
Kids will have a blast creating new adventures!
Perfect for any Octonauts collection
input_text.Response A:
Get ready for an aquatic adventure with the Fisher-Price Octonauts Peso and The Tree Lobster! This exciting set features the brave Peso, who is always ready to rescue any creature in need, and the adorable baby tree lobster. The lobster can fit in Peso's rescue fish-pack, so he can easily be transported to safety. The air tank and fish-pack can also snap onto Peso's back, so he is always prepared for any situation.

This set is perfect for any Octonauts collection and will surely be a hit with kids who love to create new adventures. The Fisher-Price Octonauts Peso and The Tree Lobster is a great way to encourage imaginative play and learn about the importance of rescue and conservation. So, whether you're an Octonauts fan or just looking for a unique and fun toy, this set is sure to please. Order yours today and join the underwater adventure!
input_text.Response B: Peso is a brave and resourceful Octonaut who is always ready to lend a helping hand. With his trusty air tank and rescue fish-pack, he is equipped to take on any challenge. In this exciting adventure, Peso makes use of his skills to rescue a baby tree lobster from danger. His daring rescue mission involves navigating treacherous terrain and overcoming obstacles. With the help of his loyal companions, Peso is able to save the baby tree lobster and return it to its family. This product offers hours of imaginative play and is perfect for any child who loves the Octonauts.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
